Hi I'm Bukola, and this is the plot for $f(x)=2x$, where $x \in \mathbb{R}$

```{python}
#| echo: false
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Data
x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
y = [2, 4, 6, 8, 10]

# Plot
plt.scatter(x, y)
plt.title("My First Scatter Plot")
plt.xlabel("X Values")
plt.ylabel("Y Values")
plt.show()
```
